encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Submit - Corrected superscript markup in i.20.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - TEXT: add document division for two columns; renumber lines at head of col.i; correct the placement of the hyphen for all words broken across lines; remove |alt| tag in l.1-2; remove |ed| tag in i.9; add diacriticals to ειδωλον ll.9-10; change eta to epsilon at start of l.14 as per ed.pr.; dot the eta of τῆς in l.15; remove |ed| tag in l.20; add space before square bracket at end of l.20; correct single dots in l.21; delete |ed| markup in l.23; add filler stroke at end of l.24; delete |ed| markup in l.24; add filler strokes at end of l.25; delete |ed| markup in l.26; delete |ed| markup in ll.27-28; correct sigma to final sigma in ἐς (l.28); line 29 number is missing (which requires another renumbering of subsequent lines); correct the single dot at head of col. ii; I’d remove the sources for the alternatives in ii.32; recode ii.36-37 (χρηστηρίοισι is certain; it’s the next word that has alternatives, so it should be .2-3 before the line-end); remove |ed| tag in ii.37; dot eta in τὴν in ii.37; remove |alt| tags in ii.38; correct sigma of ἐς in ii.39; remove |ed| tag in ii.39. META: remove volume # from biblio 9607; add page numbers (227-228) for 95408 (= readings); correct the passage details, add CWKB numbers for Herodotus (915, 2691), update image link (http://163.1.169.40/gsdl/collect/POxy/index/assoc/HASH012f/214d0a97.dir/POxy.v0048.n3373.a.01.hires.jpg); update display name and delete legacy name; correct the spelling of Oxyrhynchus and add Pleiades georef (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736983);

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - TEXT: add document division for two columns; renumber lines at head of col.i; correct the placement of the hyphen for all words broken across lines; remove |alt| tag in l.1-2; remove |ed| tag in i.9; add diacriticals to ειδωλον ll.9-10; change eta to epsilon at start of l.14 as per ed.pr.; dot the eta of τῆς in l.15; remove |ed| tag in l.20; add space before square bracket at end of l.20; correct single dots in l.21; delete |ed| markup in l.23; add filler stroke at end of l.24; delete |ed| markup in l.24; add filler strokes at end of l.25; delete |ed| markup in l.26; delete |ed| markup in ll.27-28; correct sigma to final sigma in ἐς (l.28); line 29 number is missing (which requires another renumbering of subsequent lines); correct the single dot at head of col. ii; I’d remove the sources for the alternatives in ii.32; recode ii.36-37 (χρηστηρίοισι is certain; it’s the next word that has alternatives, so it should be .2-3 before the line-end); remove |ed| tag in ii.37; dot eta in τὴν in ii.37; remove |alt| tags in ii.38; correct sigma of ἐς in ii.39; remove |ed| tag in ii.39. META: remove volume # from biblio 9607; add page numbers (227-228) for 95408 (= readings); correct the passage details, add CWKB numbers for Herodotus (915, 2691), update image link (http://163.1.169.40/gsdl/collect/POxy/index/assoc/HASH012f/214d0a97.dir/POxy.v0048.n3373.a.01.hires.jpg); update display name and delete legacy name; correct the spelling of Oxyrhynchus and add Pleiades georef (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736983);
Submit - Originally submitted to litpap.info 2017.12.12 by David Chou. Submission has been transferred to papyri.info. Submission notes were: "Updated metadata and added text"
